title: Work visas (H-1B, L-1, O-1, etc.) and I-94 records
dataVerified: Name, visa type, expiration date, employer, passport number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: I-9 compliance; prevents altered expiration dates; DHS domain binding. Foreign workers can verify status without carrying physical visa documents, reducing risk while traveling domestically.
